statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY phone_number ASC;
SELECT customer_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%yahoo.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY orders.total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM order_items JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE o.total_amount > 500;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM OrderDetails WHERE quantity >= 5 AND total_price < 100 ORDER BY total_price ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 10 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE Orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, product_price, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_price < 50 ORDER BY product_price ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.total_amount, COUNT(OrderDetails.order_detail_id) AS items_count FROM Orders JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.order_id = OrderDetails.order_id GROUP BY Orders.order_id HAVING items_count > 2 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
